sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import './LoanForm.css'; // Ensure this path is correct import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // Updated import const LoanForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ Full_Name: '', Address: '', PAN_Number: '', Company_Name: '', Current_Salary: '', Previous_Salary: '', Owns_House: '', Rent_Amount: '', Grocery_Expense: '', Current_EMIs: '', Date_Previous_Hike: '', Date_Next_Hike: '', Bank_Name: '', Credit_Score: '', Number_of_Credit_Cards: '', Total_Credit_Limit: '', Number_of_Loans: '', Employment_Duration: '', Job_Title: '', Bonuses_Allowances: '', Savings: '', Investments: '', Monthly_Expenses: '', Age: '', Education_Level: '', Marital_Status: '', Dependents: '', Loan_Purpose: '', Mall_Visits_Per_Month: '', Mall_Spend_Average: '', Loans: [], }); const bankOptions = [ 'State Bank of India', 'HDFC Bank', 'ICICI Bank', 'Axis Bank', 'Kotak Mahindra Bank', 'Bank of Baroda', 'Punjab National Bank', 'Canara Bank', 'Union Bank of India', 'Indian Bank', 'IndusInd Bank', 'IDFC FIRST Bank', 'Bandhan Bank', 'Yes Bank', 'South Indian Bank', 'Ujjivan Small Finance Bank', 'RBL Bank', 'Federal Bank', 'Lakshmi Vilas Bank', 'Jammu & Kashmir Bank', 'Others' ]; const jobTitleOptions = [ 'Software Engineer', 'Data Analyst', 'Product Manager', 'Financial Analyst', 'Marketing Manager', 'Sales Executive', 'HR Manager', 'Consultant', 'Graphic Designer', 'Project Manager', 'Business Analyst', 'Operations Manager', 'Customer Service Executive', 'Accountant', 'Content Writer', 'Web Developer', 'UX/UI Designer', 'Network Engineer', 'Digital Marketer', 'Administrative Assistant', 'Research Scientist', 'Others' ]; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevFormData => { // Clear Rent_Amount if Owns_House is updated to "Yes" if (name === 'Owns_House' && value === 'Yes') { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: value, Rent_Amount: '' // Clear Rent_Amount when Owns_House is "Yes" }; } return { ...prevFormData, [name]: value }; }); }; const validateForm = () => { for (const key in formData) { if (key !== 'Loans' && formData[key].trim() === '') { return false; // Return false if any field except Loans is empty } } return true; }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!validateForm()) { toast.error('Please fill out all required fields.'); return; } try { const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/predict', formData); const data = response.data; console.log('Prediction Results:', response.data); toast.success('Loan application submitted successfully!'); navigate('/result', { state: { resultData: data } }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error making prediction:', error.response ? error.response.data : error.message); toast.error('An error occurred while submitting the application.'); } }; const handleNumberOfLoansChange = (e) => { const numberOfLoans = parseInt(e.target.value, 10); const loans = Array(numberOfLoans).fill({ EMI: '', Tenure: '' }); setFormData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, Number_of_Loans: e.target.value, Loans: loans })); }; const handleChangeform = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; if (name.startsWith('Loan_')) { const [loanIndex, field] = name.split('_').slice(1); const loans = [...formData.Loans]; // Ensure the loanIndex is within bounds if (loanIndex < loans.length) { loans[loanIndex] = { ...loans[loanIndex], [field]: value }; setFormData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, Loans: loans })); } } else { handleChange(e); } }; return (
{/* Personal Information Section */}

Personal Information

{/* Employment Information Section */}

Employment Information

{formData.Owns_House === 'No' && (
)}
{/* Financial Information Section */}

Financial Information

{formData.Number_of_Loans > 0 && (

Loan Details

{formData.Loans.map((loan, index) => (
))}
)}
); } export default LoanForm;
